attributes.action: Make "Life" Mean "Life" & following the appalling, disgusting, dispicable sentences handed to those responsible for Baby P's death, to enforce tougher and longer sentences for all found guilty of any kind of abuse against children. Make them AT LEAST serve the FULL length of the term given to them!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am absolutely appalled at reading the sentences given in respect of poor Baby P's death.  Is that all his short little life was worth? A minimum of 10 years each - AND this included the term for raping a 2 year old girl!!!!  This Government AND British Justice System are a disgrace. I am totally embarrased by the decision! Social Services, Doctors, Carers - all should be ashamed of themselves, STOP blaming others and CHANGE The system! Bring in the American Justice System. If there was the tiniest shred of deterrent in this Country, it might help!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
